name: a_chapter_by_its_slug
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool manga_scrapper.
Tool description: Get webtoon / comic data from favourite scanlation websites.
API description: Make request to fetch a specific chapter information for a specific webtoon from a specific provider.

slug.description: The slug identifier for the chapter. See /chapters for the chapter list.

provider.description: The slug identifier for the webtoon provider. See /providers for the provider list.

webtoon.description: The slug identifier for the webtoon. See /webtoons for the webtoon list.
